module: Module-level comment: The module "altera_mult_add_ujt2" performs multiplication and optional addition/subtraction operations after accepting 16-bit wide "dataa" and "datab" inputs synchronously with "clock0" and asynchronous reset "aclr0". The operations are performed by an instantiated "altera_mult_add_rtl" logic block. An internal 32-bit wide wire - "wire_altera_mult_add_rtl1_result" connects the logic block to the main 32-bit wide "result" output. The module is suitable for applications requiring the multiplier-accumulator concept.
